concept.title: JMS Consumer
concept.shortdesc: The JMS Consumer reads data from a Java Messaging Service (JMS). The JMS Consumer also supports reading Advanced Message Queuing Protocol (AMQP) messages.

conbody.p: JMS Consumer originovervieworiginsJMS ConsumerWhen you configure a JMS Consumer, you configure the connection information and the queue or topic name. You can optionally use JMS credentials and remove control characters. You can also define a JMS message selector to specify the messages that the origin reads. By default, the JMS Consumer reads all messages.
JMS stores the offset with the JMS server. You cannot reset the offset for the JMS Consumer.
